com.leonovich.cofeebreak.web.controller

Class WelcomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leonovich.cofeebreak.web.controller.WelcomeController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/")
@PropertySource(value="classpath:messages.properties")
public class WelcomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by alexanderleonovich on 29.08.15. Controller of application. Contains methods, what perform the function of registration of customer and signi in customer on site and other.
